MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Red Chris Project in North America dated May 2010.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Red Chris Project in North America dated May 2010.pdf
document.description: This technical report provides an update on the mineral resources of the Red Chris porphyry copper-gold deposit in British Columbia, incorporating new exploration drilling and geological mapping data collected between 2007 and early 2010.
